nodes.text: Battle in the Streets! was a web enhancement published at Wizards.com on November 20, 2000 for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game, to be used with the Invasion of Theed adventure game.
During the Battle of Naboo, a group of heroes help two Royal Naboo Security Force guards protect civilians in Theed from a group of Trade Federation battle droids led by a Vulture droid.
